section.title: Description
section.p: Sets the current connection to a "read-only" connection, as if the current user were defined as a readOnlyAccess user. (For more information about database authorization, see the .)

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: ij> connect 'jdbc:derby:menuDB'; ij> readonly on; ij> SELECT * FROM menu; COURSE |ITEM |PRICE ----------------------------------------------- entree |lamb chop |14 dessert |creme brulee |6 appetizer |baby greens |7 entree |lamb chop |14 entree |lamb chop |14 dessert |creme brulee |6 6 rows selected ij> UPDATE menu set price = 3; ERROR 25502: An SQL data change is not permitted for a read-only connection, user or database.
